Variable: Unemployment, male (% of male labor force) (modeled ILO estimate)
Unit of measurement: % of male labor force, % of male labor force

Variable: Unemployment, female (% of female labor force) (modeled ILO estimate)
Unit of measurement: % of female labor force, % of female labor force

Variable: Unemployment, youth male (% of male labor force ages 15-24) (modeled ILO estimate)
Unit of measurement: % of male labor force ages 15-24, % of male labor force ages 15-24

Variable: Unemployment, youth female (% of female labor force ages 15-24) (modeled ILO estimate)
Unit of measurement: % of female labor force ages 15-24, % of male labor force ages 15-25

Variable: Unemployment with basic education (% of total labor force with basic education)
Unit of measurement: % of total labor force with basic education

Variable: Unemployment with intermediate education (% of total labor force with intermediate education)
Unit of measurement: % of total labor force with intermediate education

Variable: Unemployment with advanced education (% of total labor force with advanced education)
Unit of measurement: % of total labor force with advanced education
